game.name: POSTAL: Brain Damaged
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: POSTAL: Brain Damaged is a new, action-oriented take on the Running With Scissors’ cult game series with throwback graphics, and fast-paced, modern gameplay. Take a wild roller coaster ride through the twisted wonderland encased in the POSTAL DUDE’S messed-up mind.
game.shortDescriptionEn: POSTAL: Brain Damaged is a new, action-oriented take on the Running With Scissors’ cult game series with throwback graphics, and fast-paced, modern gameplay. Take a wild roller coaster ride through the twisted wonderland encased in the POSTAL DUDE’S messed-up mind.

reviewHighlights.text: - 최적화 잘 됨 - 버그 거의 없음 - 적이 우글우글 나오면 노래도 그에 맞게 틀어주는데 할맛 ㅈㄴ남 - 오줌을 무한대로 쌀 수 있다???? 100/10점줌
